{\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;}
{\*\expandedcolortbl;;}
\margl1440\margr1440\vieww11520\viewh8400\viewkind0
\pard\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640\pardirnatural\partightenfactor0

\f0\fs24 \cf0 \
\
Python 2 (12-8-21)\
\
\'95 Variable: Key word that stores a value / you need a variable as you can change the value\
  * Integer \'96 whole numbers\
  * Float \'96 decimal number \
  * String \'96 alphabetical letters, symbols, anything on quotes \
    * f\'92 string (format): look for curly brackets and use them as variables\
  * Boolean \'96 True or False (capital T and F)\
\
\'95 List: Indicates is a list because of square brackets and commas to divide the elements\
  * Made of elements \
  * Index based\
  * Start in index based \'910\'92\
  * No spaces after the commas \
  * Can store list inside of list\
  * Are iterable (can loop thru them)\
  * Starting at -1 will start from the back to the front\
\
\'95 Tuple: works very similar to lists\
  * It is immutable\
  * Index based\
  * Tuple unpacking \
\
\'95 Functions: execution of one or many steps\
  * you define a function by using def\
  * Parenthesis is used for functions\
  * Print will show the function\
  * Shit tab will show the documentation\
  * type() will show the type of value\
  * len() will show how many elements\
  * .index() will return the index number of the value in a list\
  * .append() will add a value to the list at the end of the list\
  * .remove() will remove a value (delete)\
  * .pop() will pop it out of the list (copy and paste)\
  * .items() will show everything on the list or dictionary \
  * for i in will create a list print\
  * : in python means we are going to start a code block\
  * functions have arguments or parameters\
  * return will return the result back to a variable\
\
\'95 Dictionaries: key \'96 value pairs / indicates is a dictionary because of the curly brackets\
  * \{\'93key\'94:\'93value\'94\}\
  * Dictionaries don\'92t have concepts of append / pop / remove\'85\
  * Can loop\
}
